title: League Client (6.11.16_05_26_22_56) Black Screen
body:
Hello,

I logged into league this afternoon to find myself faced with a black screen (see below).
It occurs just after login.

[[Link to screenshot]](http://i.imgur.com/HepxBdb.png)

The client version is: 6.11.16_05_26_22_56

Has anyone else had this problem before or have any clue how to get around it?

Thanks,
Luke (sparmerlin).

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried running a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?
